item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 1, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Procedural knowledge in pretraining drives reasoning in large language models (111 points | 13 comments)
2. Advent of Code 2024 (791 points | 303 comments)
3. The Color of Noise – The Witness (2014) (11 points | discuss)
4. Heaviside’s Operator Calculus (2007) (23 points | 4 comments)

6. How can I grow as an engineer without good seniors to learn from? (35 points | 31 comments)
7. Show HN: Vicinity – Fast, Lightweight Nearest Neighbors with Flexible Back Ends (19 points | 1 comment)
8. Cursed Linear Types in Rust (42 points | 3 comments)
9. Review of "Statistics" by Freedman, Pisani, and Purves (2017) (102 points | 14 comments)
10. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring Full Stack Engineers in SF and Remotely ( | hide)
11. Show HN: Open-source private home security camera system (end-to-end encryption) (407 points | 115 comments)
12. Ntfs2btrfs does in-place conversion of NTFS filesystem to the open-source Btrfs (370 points | 141 comments)
13. Kyawthuite is so rare it's only ever been found once (160 points | 53 comments)
14. AMD Disables Zen 4's Loop Buffer (278 points | 109 comments)
15. Jeff Dean responds to EDA industry about AlphaChip (183 points | 118 comments)
16. Handwriting but not typewriting leads to widespread connectivity in brain (87 points | 64 comments)
17. Fine, I'll Play With Skiplists (72 points | 9 comments)
18. DynaSaur: Large Language Agents Beyond Predefined Actions (111 points | 27 comments)
19. Django: Fix a view using a debugger with breakpoint() (9 points | 5 comments)
20. Who can claim Aristotle? (50 points | 21 comments)
21. Turning bogs from wastelands to nature-scapes (27 points | 8 comments)
22. WinDepends – A Rewrite of the Dependency Walker (138 points | 25 comments)
23. Geometric line-art of Wacław Szpakowski (2017) (446 points | 48 comments)
24. An 83-year-old short story by Borges portends a bleak future for the internet (68 points | 48 comments)
25. Historic Bottle Website (42 points | 7 comments)
26. Safe relational database queries using the Rust type system (260 points | 145 comments)
27. Kubernetes on Hetzner: cutting my infra bill by 75% (102 points | 42 comments)
28. The Slang Shading Language (119 points | 38 comments)
29. The Opposite of Documentation is Superstition (2020) (140 points | 71 comments)
30. Memento Movi (44 points | 15 comments)
